thread.title: Bookmakers: Late Flood of Pre-Inauguration Money on Trump Being Impeached or Resigning
thread.title_full: Bookmakers: Late Flood of Pre-Inauguration Money on Trump Being Impeached or Resigning

author: Joe DePaolo
title: Bookmakers: Late Flood of Pre-Inauguration Money on Trump Being Impeached or Resigning
text:
Bookmakers: Late Flood of Pre-Inauguration Money on Trump Being Impeached or Resigning by Joe DePaolo | 11:43   
Bookmakers in Europe have reported a flood of late money coming in on Donald Trump not finishing his term prior to his Inauguration on Friday. 
According to The Independent , the odds on Trump not finishing his term due to resignation or his being impeached have fallen from 2-1 to even money. A reported 90 percent of all wagers that have been taken by the London-based bookmaker Ladbrokes have been on Trump not finishing his term. 
And according to Ireland-based bookmaker Paddy Power, think it will happen very quickly. That company is offering a wager on the date of a possible Trump impeachment. Most of their customers think it will happen within six months. The odds on that possibility have crashed from 8-1 to 4-1. 
[ image via screengrab ] 
Follow Joe DePaolo (@ joe_depaolo ) on Twitter
